delete_event_by_uid.description: Delete an event from an calendar.

uid.description: UID of event to be deleted.
uid.name: UID

delete_event_by_uid.name: Delete event by UID

description.description: A more complete description of the event than the one provided by the summary.
description.name: Description

end_date.description: The date the all-day event should end (exclusive).
end_date.name: End date

end_date_time.description: The date and time the event should end.
end_date_time.name: End time

in.description: Days or weeks that you want to create the event in.
in.name: In

start_date.description: The date the all-day event should start.
start_date.name: Start date

start_date_time.description: The date and time the event should start.
start_date_time.name: Start time

summary.description: Defines the short summary or subject for the event.
summary.name: Summary

get_events.description: Retrieves events on a calendar within a time range.

duration.description: Returns active events from Start time for the specified duration.
duration.name: Duration

end_date_time.description: Returns active events before this time (exclusive). Cannot be used with Duration.
end_date_time.name: End time

start_date_time.description: Returns active events after this time (exclusive). When not set, defaults to now.
start_date_time.name: Start time

get_events.name: Get events
